text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
A pleasant scene played out in my mind. 
It was a Christmas memory from my childhood…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
After finishing all his prep work, my father had taken 
out the time to make us a French-style Christmas cake. 
It was incredibly sweet and delicious ——

text_block_list.name: Young Flash
text_block_list.text: It's so good! You're amazing, papa! Why are your cakes always so delicious!?

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Let me see… I think it's because I closely followed the recipe. This is not just any recipe, either. It has been perfected through constant trial and error.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: From the specific ingredients to the baking time and how to work in the powdered sugar, everything has been precisely established. Then I make it exactly as indicated.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Not allowing yourself to be off by a single gram — that's the key to great taste, and something I take pride in as a pâtissier.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Do you understand, Flash? Our ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……? 
Where am I…?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……I'm sorry, could you explain what happened? 
Why am I lying in the infirmary?
choice_data_list: You got a bit lightheaded and collapsed.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……I see. It looks like I was more exhausted than I anticipated.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
But if it wasn't anything serious, then this won't prevent me 
from entering the Selection Race tomorrow. Isn't that right?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I know. In this condition, I won't be able to put forth my best 
performance… That's what you want to get at, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Even so, I absolutely can not miss tomorrow's race. 
Tomorrow is… my only chance.
choice_data_list: Why are you pushing yourself so hard…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
…When I came to this country, I exchanged promises with 
my parents. That exactly a year from then, I would show 
them how well and how much I had grown.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
So I asked them for just a day of their time in return. 
And true to their promise, they freed up space in their 
busy schedule for me.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: That's why I have to keep my own promise… and show them a result worthy of a Meister's commitment.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It's a rank in Germany's qualification system for artisans. 
Through his hard work, my father rose to the rank of Meister 
and was able to open the cake shop he always dreamed of.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
My mother had been a racing horsegirl… but after she retired, 
she also earned her Meister title and started helping my father.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Seeing my father steadily working his way to opening his 
dream shop… and my mother giving her all in races before 
running straight into a new lifestyle without pause…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I really respect the both of them. And just like my parents, 
I want to firmly accomplish what I set out to do.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
So what is it that I must do then? When I thought about that, 
my mother's races came to mind.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Horsegirls often find their greatest source of pride in racing. 
…It follows, then, that I should run.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Firmly training myself every day, finishing races in 
the position expected. Culminating in winning a G1 
and experiencing a horsegirl's proudest moments.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
If I can do that, then at the end of it all… I'm sure I will 
have grown into someone befitting my amazing parents.

At last I understood the deeper reasons behind her obsession 
with her program. In her own way, she simply wished to have 
her parents recognize her efforts.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……I didn't expect to collapse like that. 
Nonetheless, it's too late for changes.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Even if my approach was wrong, and this was the result 
of my mistakes… I can not turn back at this point.

There is nothing wrong with wanting desperately to improve. 
She is only lacking the flexibility to adapt to the situation.

But it is indeed late. Now that I better understand how 
she feels, I know I won't be able to stop her from entering 
the race. So what I should tell her instead is ——
choice_data_list: <size=38>Your feelings will show through, I'm certain.</size>

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……My feelings?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Taking pride in my efforts, my feelings… It's all so ambiguous. 
It seems you and I have very different ways of thinking.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That reminds me, I still haven't thanked you. 
You were the one who carried me here… isn't that right?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……Umm, I've been wondering for a while… 
What makes you so concerned with me?
choice_data_list: …I guess I just couldn't leave you be?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
choice_data_list: <size=30>You seemed so sincere and a little offbeat, it made me worry.</size>

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……Offbeat…?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That is the first time anyone has said that… 
Even considering this latest development, 
I don't see how that describes me…
choice_data_list: <size=34>You stand out plenty from others's perspective.</size>

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
choice_data_list: Anyway, get plenty of rest today.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……I will. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Aah, Flash! You're finally back! 
Sheesh, I was so worried about you, you know!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hm, ignoring me now? Heeey, Flash?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……Falcon. Do I… seem offbeat to you?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huh? Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……!? Why is that…?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Well, I mean… you tend to fixate on a particular thing… 
Like… you're not exactly the flexible type who's good 
at juggling a lot, you know?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Look at you now, even. You were probably so caught up in 
coming back quickly that you haven't noticed, have you?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……? What should I notice?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: You still have your infirmary slippers on ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, see, I knew you hadn't noticed! 
…Aren't you glad to have someone point 
such things out for you?☆

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……Maybe so…

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
In any case, I'm glad you look fine～ 
You better get to sleep. Good luck tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: —— Thanks.
